conversations.content: Please save all order invoices from the current month and save them to /user/invoices. After that, calculating the sum of all payments found within /user/invoices.

Next I'll ensure the /user/invoices directory exists, fetch each invoice for orders in the current month, save each invoice to /user/invoices, then list and read the saved invoice files to extract payment amounts and compute the sum. Proceeding to get the current day now.
